meanings.sent1: Her chutzpa in asking for a raise after only a week of work surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: His chutzpa in cutting the line at the store angered the other customers.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed chutzpa by stealing nuts right in front of the dog.
meanings.sent4: The politician's chutzpa in making promises he couldn't keep was evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The student's chutzpa in copying the entire essay word for word was unbelievable.

meanings.definition: Boldness or daring, especially with confident disregard for personal safety or conventional behavior.
meanings.sent1: The explorer's chutzpa in venturing into the uncharted jungle was admirable.
meanings.sent2: She showed great chutzpa by standing up to the bully in school.
meanings.sent3: The cat's chutzpa in chasing a much larger dog around the yard was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His chutzpa in skydiving without any training was like jumping into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter's chutzpa in running into the burning building to save the child was heroic.
